mapper.insert: insert into storemanage_drug_device (id, name, treatType, type, `usage`) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{treatType}, #{type}, #{usage})
insert into storemanage_record (id, createDate, smallClassId, exerciser) VALUES (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{smallClassId}, #{exerciser})

insert into storemanage_record_detail (id, recordId, drugOrDeviceId, outletNumber) VALUES
(#{details.id}, #{details.recordId}, #{details.drugOrDeviceId}, #{details.outletNumber})
